Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2016 03:43PM susanmc wrote: Hello I'm new here. Just go my final Dx today from Memoria Sloan Kettering in NYC. Stage 4 - I guess this is my crying day or adjustmant day. I go back Monday to meet a Doc that will do a biopsy on one of the bones they say in my PET/ CT scan. Cant add much just that I'm terrified. Hoping stronger days to follow.
